description: Removes a source from a bridge.

parameters.name: BridgeArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bridge that you want to update.

parameters.name: SourceName
parameters.description: The name of the bridge source that you want to remove.

nested_items.name: BridgeArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the bridge from which the source was removed.

nested_items.name: SourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the bridge source that was removed.
